nodeList.loreText: Mana is a mage's most vital tool and his ability to produce it is his most vital ability
nodeList.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, returning 10 mana to you for each enemy hit. 

Deals 10 base lightning damage. Added damage applies at half effectiveness.

nodeList.description: Mana Strike has increased attack speed.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [6%] increased attack speed per point

node.loreText: Mana is a mage's most vital tool and his ability to produce it is his most vital ability
node.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, returning 10 mana to you for each enemy hit. 

Deals 10 base lightning damage. Added damage applies at half effectiveness.

nodeList.description: You deal increased damage if you have hit an enemy with Mana Strike recently (past 4 seconds).
nodeList.nodeDescription: [7%] global increased damage per point if you have hit an enemy with mana strike in the past 4 seconds

node.description: Mana Strike has increased attack speed.
node.nodeDescription: [6%] increased attack speed per point

node.loreText: Mana is a mage's most vital tool and his ability to produce it is his most vital ability
node.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, returning 10 mana to you for each enemy hit. 

Deals 10 base lightning damage. Added damage applies at half effectiveness.

nodeList.description: Mana Strike hits grant you increased spell damage for 4 seconds. This effect can stack.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Gain 5% increased spell damage per point for each enemy hit for 4 seconds.

node.description: You deal increased damage if you have hit an enemy with Mana Strike recently (past 4 seconds).
node.nodeDescription: [7%] global increased damage per point if you have hit an enemy with mana strike in the past 4 seconds

node.description: Mana Strike has increased attack speed.
node.nodeDescription: [6%] increased attack speed per point

node.loreText: Mana is a mage's most vital tool and his ability to produce it is his most vital ability
node.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, returning 10 mana to you for each enemy hit. 

Deals 10 base lightning damage. Added damage applies at half effectiveness.

stats.statName: Global Spell Damage Per Enemy Hit

nodeList.description: Mana Strike grants mana when it kills an enemy.
nodeList.nodeDescription: 3 mana gained on kill per point

node.altText: This damage is not affected by mana strike's reduced effectiveness of added damage.
node.description: Mana Strike has additional base lightning damage equal to a percentage of your current mana.
node.nodeDescription: Adds base lightning damage equal to [5%] of your current mana per point

node.loreText: Mana is a mage's most vital tool and his ability to produce it is his most vital ability
node.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, returning 10 mana to you for each enemy hit.

nodeList.description: Mana Strike grants mana when it critically strikes an enemy.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [3] mana gained on critical hit per point

node.description: Mana Strike grants you more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 3 additional mana gained on hit per point

node.description: Mana Strike deals damage in a larger area.
node.nodeDescription: [30%] increased area of effect per point

node.description: Mana Strike has increased attack speed.
node.nodeDescription: [6%] increased attack speed per point

node.loreText: Mana is a mage's most vital tool and his ability to produce it is his most vital ability

A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, returning 10 mana to you for each enemy hit.

node.description: Mana Strike gains base critical strike chance equal to a percentage of your current mana, but loses a fixed amount of base critical strike chance.
node.nodeDescription: Subtracts 5% from crit chance. Adds crit chance equal to 10% of your current mana.

node.altText: This damage is not affected by mana strike's reduced effectiveness of added damage.
node.description: Mana Strike has additional base lightning damage equal to a percentage of your current mana.
node.nodeDescription: Adds base lightning damage equal to [5%] of your current mana per point

stats.statName: Mana Gained While Out Of Mana

nodeList.description: Mana Strike has increased attack speed. {Lightning} created by {Mana Storm} costs less mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [4%] increased attack speed per point. Lightning from Mana Storm drains [20%] less mana per point.

node.altText: {Lightning} scales with increases to spell damage and lightning damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.
node.description: Mana Strike additionally strikes enemies it hits with {Lightning} while you are not out of mana. {Lightning} costs 15 mana.
node.nodeDescription: If you have more than zero mana enemies you hit with mana strike are struck by lightning. Each lightning strike drains 20 mana from you.

node.description: Mana Strike grants you more mana if it hits an enemy.
node.nodeDescription: [3] additional mana gained on hit per point

node.nodeDescription: [3] ward gained on hit per point

node.loreText: Mana is a mage's most vital tool and his ability to produce it is his most vital ability
node.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, returning 10 mana to you for each enemy hit. 

Deals 10 base lightning damage. Added damage applies at half effectiveness.

node.description: Mana Strike grants you more mana if it hits an enemy.
node.nodeDescription: [3] additional mana gained on hit per point

node.loreText: Mana is a mage's most vital tool and his ability to produce it is his most vital ability
node.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, returning 10 mana to you for each enemy hit. 

Deals 10 base lightning damage. Added damage applies at half effectiveness.

nodeList.description: Mana Strike automatically targets the enemy closest to the cursor and has improved base critical strike chance.

node.description: Mana Strike hits enemies at a target location, rather than in front of you, but grants significantly less mana.
node.nodeDescription: The arc of lightning created by your weapon teleports to the target location, allowing you to attack from range. 20% more damage. 70% reduced mana gained on hit.

node.description: You deal increased damage if you have hit an enemy with Mana Strike recently (past 4 seconds).
node.nodeDescription: [7%] global increased damage per point if you have hit an enemy with mana strike in the past 4 seconds

node.description: Mana Strike has increased attack speed.
node.nodeDescription: [6%] increased attack speed per point

node.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, returning 10 mana to you for each enemy hit. 

Deals 10 base lightning damage. Added damage applies at half effectiveness.

nodeList.description: Mana Strike grants twice as much mana on hit and hits in a much larger area, but has a cooldown and less attack speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: 10 additional mana gained on hit, adds a 3 second cooldown.

node.description: Mana Strike grants you more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 3 additional mana gained on hit per point

node.description: Mana Strike deals damage in a larger area.
node.nodeDescription: [30%] increased area of effect per point

node.description: Mana Strike has increased attack speed.
node.nodeDescription: [6%] increased attack speed per point

node.loreText: Mana is a mage's most vital tool and his ability to produce it is his most vital ability
node.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, returning 10 mana to you for each enemy hit. 

Deals 10 base lightning damage. Added damage applies at half effectiveness.

node.description: Mana Strike grants mana when it critically strikes an enemy.
node.nodeDescription: [3] mana gained on critical hit per point

node.description: Mana Strike gains base critical strike chance equal to a percentage of your current mana, but loses a fixed amount of base critical strike chance.
node.nodeDescription: Subtracts 5% from crit chance. Adds crit chance equal to 10% of your current mana.

node.altText: This damage is not affected by mana strike's reduced effectiveness of added damage.
node.description: Mana Strike has additional base lightning damage equal to a percentage of your current mana.
node.nodeDescription: Adds base lightning damage equal to [5%] of your current mana per point

A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, returning 10 mana to you for each enemy hit.

node.description: Mana Strike grants more mana on hit while you are out of mana.
node.nodeDescription: [5] additional mana gained on hit per point while you are out of mana

node.description: Mana Strike deals more damage while you are out of mana.
node.nodeDescription: [25%] increased damage per point while out of mana

node.description: Mana Strike has increased attack speed.
node.nodeDescription: [6%] increased attack speed per point

stats.statName: Mana Gained While Out Of Mana

nodeList.description: Mana Strike hits have a chance to attach a {Spark Charge}, which deals lightning damage to nearby enemies after 1 second or when the enemy dies.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [25%] chance per point to attach a spark charge on hit.

node.altText: This damage is not affected by mana strike's reduced effectiveness of added damage.
node.description: Mana Strike has additional base lightning damage equal to a percentage of your current mana.
node.nodeDescription: Adds base lightning damage equal to [5%] of your current mana per point

node.loreText: Mana is a mage's most vital tool and his ability to produce it is his most vital ability
node.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, returning 10 mana to you for each enemy hit. 

Deals 10 base lightning damage. Added damage applies at half effectiveness.

nodeList.altText: {Lightning} scales with increases to spell damage and lightning damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.
nodeList.description: Mana Strike additionally strikes enemies it hits with {Lightning} while you are not out of mana. {Lightning} costs 15 mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: If you have more than zero mana enemies you hit with mana strike are struck by lightning. Each lightning strike drains 20 mana from you.

node.description: Mana Strike grants you more mana if it hits an enemy.
node.nodeDescription: [3] additional mana gained on hit per point
